duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic direction and guidance for the healthcare talent acquisition team, aligning recruitment initiatives with the organization's goals and growth objectives.
Lead, mentor, and manage a team of recruiters, fostering a collaborative and high-performing culture while maintaining a focus on results and continuous improvement.
Develop and execute comprehensive recruitment strategies to attract and retain top healthcare talent across various specialties.
Collaborate closely with department heads, executives, and HR leadership to understand staffing needs, workforce planning, and talent requirements to drive effective hiring solutions.
Champion an exceptional candidate experience throughout the recruitment process, ensuring seamless communication, timely feedback, and a positive impression of the organization.
Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of recruitment efforts, regularly providing data-driven insights and recommendations to improve processes.
Stay abreast of industry trends, market conditions, and best practices in healthcare recruitment to proactively adapt strategies and remain competitive in talent acquisition.
Manage relationships with external recruitment agencies, job boards, and other relevant partners to optimize sourcing channels and extend the organization's reach.
Ensure adherence to relevant legal and regulatory requirements in healthcare recruitment, maintaining a strong commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion.
Work within allocated budgets to maximize recruitment effectiveness and deliver cost-efficient solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
